summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4119 for the improvement of 11th Avenue South from West 65th Street to West 70th Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49406, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
